category: National Team Athletes’ Village Operation Regulations/Article 4 (Duties)
contents: Article 4 (Duties) The Athletes’ Village performs the following duties. Revised on October 23, 2020. 1. Establishment and implementation of training plans for national team athletes 2. Provision of training facilities for national team candidate athletes, youth athletes and aspiring athletes 3. Establishment and implementation of sports medicine and science plans 4. Anti-doping Education of national athletes and coaches and response to doping tests to spread culture 5. Operation and management of athletes’ village facilities and equipment 6. Operation of athletes’ village medical center 7. Operation of athletes’ village experience and visit programs 8. Protection of sports human rights
